title: It’s My Special Recipe!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Ta-da~! Look, look! It’s my special recipe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A chocolate pound cake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>How naive…. A naivete that befits a chocolate lover like you, Eli….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Countless crimson orbs reside on it’s pure black body…. There’s nothing more fitting as an offering to hell….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>*munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah! Wait!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I see, you topped it with freeze-dried strawberries. Hnn~, it’s delicious! I love bitter chocolates<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Right!? They’re really tasty! I’ll have some too. Aaan…. Hnn~, so good~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, it’s a cake that can make even a fallen angel smile like that, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
